definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Another year and another dream had been eaten by the locusts .
sentences.chinese: 又一年，又一個好夢因蝗蟲而付諸流水了。

sentences.english: This illustration shows a vertical section through the locust.
sentences.chinese: 本圖所示爲蝗蟲的縱剖面。

sentences.english: Sometimes it is more deadly and destructive than a swarm of locusts.
sentences.chinese: 有時它比成羣的蝗蟲更加致命，更具破壞力。

sentences.english: Rain and cool temperature will kill many of the eggs the grasshoppers are laying today.
sentences.chinese: 雨水和冷涼的氣溫能破壞蝗蟲現在產下的許多卵。

sentences.english: It is the first time that biopesticides are being used on a large scale in Africa against locusts.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一次正在非洲的一個蝗蟲大規模使用生物農藥。

sentences.english: But locusts can’t swim, so how could it be?
sentences.chinese: 蝗蟲不會游泳，因此怎能發生這種情況呢？

sentences.english: Temperature is one of main factors influencing grasshopper outbreak in the region around Qinghai Lake.
sentences.chinese: 在青海湖地區，氣溫是影響草地蝗蟲發生的主要因素。
蝗蟲把鄉下的莊稼喫得淨光。

sentences.english: And John was clothed with camel's hair, and with a girdle of a skin about his loins; and he did eat locusts and wild honey;
sentences.chinese: 約翰穿駱駝毛的衣服，腰束皮帶，喫的是蝗蟲野蜜。

sentences.english: The locusts came down and started eating the wheat.
sentences.chinese: 蝗蟲飛下來，開始喫小麥。

sentences.english: 6John wore clothing made of camel's hair, with a leather belt around his waist, and he ate locusts and wild honey.
sentences.chinese: 約翰穿駱駝毛的衣服，腰束皮帶，喫的是蝗蟲野蜜。

sentences.english: Bees and locusts, they move in swarms also, and even humans.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂和蝗蟲，它們也是羣體活動，甚至人類也是。

sentences.english: Ever seen croplands destroyed by locusts.
One drawback is that it takes days to kill the locusts.
sentences.chinese: 該產品有一個缺點，即它需要數日才能殺死蝗蟲。

sentences.english: A cloud of locusts in Cancun, Mexico, in 2006
sentences.chinese: 阿雲，2006年在墨西哥坎昆，蝗蟲。

sentences.english: The vegetation of the Ordos Plateau is rare, but the species of grasshopper is higher than Shaanbei Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 鄂爾多斯高原植被稀少，蝗蟲物種卻較陝北高原豐富。

definition: to become visible/to appear/to manifest one's true nature
to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
(bird species of China) Eurasian siskin (Spinus spinus)
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
one falls, the next follows (idiom); stepping into the breach to replace fallen comrades/advancing wave upon wave
a thousand pounds hangs by a thread (idiom)/imminent peril/a matter of life or death
